page.title: 19Old Times, Rangeworthy
page.content:
{This is a continuation of Page 18
{Some older residents feel}that the village is not as good as when they were children because in those days it was a community village. Many villagers were related to one another as families seemed to stay in the same area as the one they were born in. {But now, more new people}are moving in and some older residents believe that it has become less of a community. Instead it is more like a commuter village for people who work in Yate and the Bristol area. {However, living standards}are much higher.
